text: You enter into the bar nervously, scanning the room for Guide. The bar is bustling, and the energy of Open Mic night is contagious, if not overwhelming.
*This isn't good, look at all these people...I don't belong here. I mean look at that guy with the wooden daggers and irezumi tattoos, if I slip up around him its curtains for me! *
Hey! Over here! There’s someone I’ve been wanting you to meet.
You are looking a lot less...twitchy today.
Yeah, that herbal tea you gave me is keeping my heartbeat from being defening.
This is quite the crowd today...you realize that you have some...shady looking individuals here today right? I mean, tell me the guy with the wood daggers isn't here for blood!

Wood daggers? What are you...OH! You mean the drummer with the sick dragon tattoo? That's Drummer-San! Don't worry, this guy is super chill. He's been through a lot, but you might even learn a thing or two from him!
You are making it sound like thats who you wanted me to meet....
Oi, Drummer-San! This is my friend I was telling you about. You know, the one trying to start a band!
